nodes.bodyText: why did you have to change this. The new method will produce output that does not look good, e.g., Instant { tv_sec: 5122222, tv_nsec: 893024142 }

commit.message:
main.rs: Print timestamp since the start of execution.

The old method of printing timestamps is deprecated in the new `time`
crate.  The new approach is to compute duration in ns since the start
of the program, which is even more helpful.
